# Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendments

The following proposed amendments to the Fairfax County Zoning Ordinance are scheduled to be authorized or have been authorized for advertisement of public hearings before the Planning Commission and Board of Supervisors. Please note that hearing dates and times may be subject to change.

For the convenience of the public, copies of the Staff Reports for the Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendments are available for review below. Click on an amendment to expand for more information. Some attachments to the Staff Reports may not be available in electronic format. If you are interested in viewing these documents, please contact the Zoning Administration Division at 703-324-1314.

## 

Authorized for Public Hearing

##  Contractor’s Office and Shop and Construction Vehicles 

This amendment reviewed the provisions for Contractor’s Office and Shop, including the permissions and use-specific standards. Additionally, the amendment developed a definition for construction vehicle.

For additional information, please visit the Contractor’s Office and Shop and Construction Vehicles – Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment webpage.

**Planning Commission Public Hearing:** Wednesday**,** October 30, 2024 at 7:30 p.m. 

**Board of Supervisors Public Hearing:** Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 4:30 p.m.

### Related Resources

Staff Report

Board Matter & Resolution (9/24/2024)

##  Review of Modified Accessible Parking Requirements 

This amendment evaluated possible modifications to the requirements for accessible parking spaces.

For additional information, please visit the Review of Modified Accessible Parking Requirements – Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment webpage.

**Planning Commission Public Hearing:** Wednesday**,** October 30, 2024 at 7:30 p.m. 

**Board of Supervisors Public Hearing:** Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 4:30 p.m.

### Related Resources

Staff Report

Board Matter & Resolution (9/24/2024)

The following topic areas are actively being researched and evaluated by staff to develop a proposal for an amendment to the Zoning Ordinance. These potential amendments have not been formally authorized by the Board of Supervisors for public hearing at this time. 

## 

Under Consideration

##  Special Events and Food Trucks 

This proposal examines existing standards and review processes for special events and food trucks to identify areas for improvement, increase flexibility, and remove unnecessary impediments and time limits for temporary uses such as special events and food trucks.

For additional information, please visit the Special Events and Food Trucks - Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment webpage.   


##  Planned Development Housing, Planned Development Commercial Districts, and Final Development Plan Amendment 

This proposal examines the existing secondary use standards for the Planned Development Housing (PDH), Planned Development Commercial (PDC) Districts, and require legal descriptions for Final Development Plan Amendments.

For additional information, please visit the Planned Development Housing, Planned Development Commercial Districts, and Final Development Plan Amendment page - Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment webpage.

##  PRC Plan and Minor Modification 

This proposal examines the existing standards for when a PRC Plan is not required and proposes to permit revisions to PRC Plans using the provisions for minor modifications. 

For additional information, please visit the PRC Plan and Minor Modification - Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment webpage.

## 

All public hearings are held at:

Board Auditorium  
Fairfax County Government Center  
12000 Government Center Parkway  
Fairfax, VA 22035

Persons wishing to speak at the public hearings on these topics may call the Office of the Clerk to the Planning Commission: 703-324-2865, TTY 711, and the Office of the Clerk to the Board of Supervisors: 703-324-3151, TTY 711, to be placed on the respective speakers list or may appear and be heard.

Sign up for the speakers' list online: Planning Commission | Board of Supervisors
